name: undergo
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to experience something that is unpleasant or something that involves a change
trans_examp.trans_cn: 经历，经受（令人不快的事或变化）

example.eg: She underwent an operation on a tumour in her left lung last year.
example.egtrans: 她在去年做了一次左肺肿瘤切除手术。

example.eg: Playing board games is undergoing a revival in popularity.
example.egtrans: 棋盘游戏正经历着一场复兴。
